page.title: 03Nursery and garden centre
page.content: Glynley nurseries is a 25 year old business run by a brother,sister and their mother.Plants of all types are sold and herbs are being stocked now to cater for recent demand. The business owns about 17 acres of land .About 5 acres are now lying fallow.There are 6 large green houses of 1\ acres each.Heat conservation is is now being tackled by producing hardy strains rather than production in a heated invironment. There are 9 full time staff and 2 part-time ,their hardest working time is from Febuary to June.The employees tend to remain with the business for long periods of time. Experience and expertise enables the nusery to compete with other garden centres.To be sure to keep up with customers demands the nursery stocks garden furniture and barbecues.
